name: staging.geonode.kartoza.com
description: GeoNode is a geospatial content management system that functions as a fully featured, out-of-the-box spatial data infrastructure (SDI). It manages, catalogs, and publishes geospatial data (vector and raster), supports metadata standards (ISO 19139/19115), and enables data visualization and sharing. GeoNode is used by organizations to manage their geospatial data and make it accessible via web interfaces.
data_themes: Not specified by EU DCAT-AP theme in source
geotopics: Not specified by ISO 19115:2003 theme in source
